name: Centum Combat Dice
description:
Player's actions are picked at random. Pick 5 dice to attack, add shields, or reroll. Enemy will deal damage based on its random roll from 1 to total value of player's dice. 

One hundred dice are rolled into the battlefield. The 5 dice are destroyed and the end of the player's turn. If any dice are stacked above they will fall down and be rerolled.
